default: 1 small cucumber, deseeded and very finely diced
2 tbsp freshly chopped mixed herbs such as basil, coriander, tarragon, chives, parsley

steps: Beat together the cream cheese, yoghurt and white wine vinegar and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Fold in the cucumber and herbs.
Serve with hot flatbreads, crisps or crudities.
title: Cream cheese and herb dip
